patthana15.2:1.1: Hetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.2:2.1: Nahetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.2:3.1: Hetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nahetuṁ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana15.2:4.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.2:6.1: Hetuṁ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana15.2:8.1: Hetuṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
